name: Painter (blackbat13)
description:
Painter is a small, fast-paced action game, in which your goal is to paint the whole screen! Each round lasts only 60 seconds, so give it a go!

Painter can be played solo (enemies are pretty dumb, though), or up to 4 players locally. Controls are explained in-game.

Four playable characters:

  • Blue aka the Destroyer
  • Red aka the Speeder
  • Green aka the Chaotic One
  • Grey aka the Glutton

The main purpose of the game is for it to have simple and easy to read source-code, so anyone can learn by reading it. I use this simple games to teach my students programming.

Important: currently the game supports only one, fixed resolution: 1000x1000
